commit message:
Add lang3 to master

EGit wouldn't stop bothering me about it. While less than ideal, for
putting into ver1.0.1, I think the users will live for now.

Modify ImageDownloader to use LruCache

As mentioned in the official docs, Weak/SoftReferences are not a very
good idea anymore because of the much more aggressive garbage
collection. The recommendation is to use a LruCache, which I have
modified the class to use. The performance benefit is apparent, but
could still be better.
